title: Crash
body: I cant play it crashes everytime when i join dark star mode please help :(

replies.body: I'm here to help!  It sounds like a bad game file could be failing to load the game, and resulting in that bugsplat error.  As a first step, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a repair to fix that up.  Follow the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide as well to rule out any other possibilities like driver issues.  Let me know if you have any questions!
